```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gganimate)
library(gapminder)
library(gifski)
library(dplyr)
```


First, I want to create a simple plot. In this case I'm going to create a bar chart

```{r cars}
USfertility <- ggplot(Klong, aes(x = age, y = proportion, fill = age)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position = "dodge")+
  labs(title = 'year: {closest_state}', x = 'proportion', y = 'life age') +
  ylab("proportion")+
  coord_flip()

USfertility
```

Next, I want to add 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
USfertility.animation <- USfertility +
  transition_states(year) +
  shadow_wake(wake_length = .01) 

animate(USfertility.animation, height = 500, width = 800, fps = 30, res = 100, 
        duration = 11)

anim_save("US_US_fertility.gif")
```
